sentences.sentence: City College of New York has one of the most diversified student bodies in the nation.
sentences.translation: 纽约城市大学有全美最多元化的学生群体之一。

sentences.sentence: The company's troubles started only when it diversified into new products.
sentences.translation: 该公司的麻烦从实现产品多样化时才开始。

sentences.sentence: The swift growth of this merchant marine diversified the northern colonial economy and made it more self-sufficient.
sentences.translation: 这艘商船的迅速发展使北方殖民地经济多样化，使其自给自足的能力更强。
